tool_description: IDfy’s User Authentication API helps you mitigate identity risks by performing facial recognition and comparison checks in real time.
name: User authentication
title: User authentication

api_list.name: Face compare(sync)
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to compare two face images. It consumes two images(with a face) in the request body and produces a match score between two faces.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://user-authentication3.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/compare/face"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "user-authentication3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Face liveness check(sync)
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to check if the face in the image is a picture of a living person or it is a picture of a picture/screen etc.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://user-authentication3.p.rapidapi.com/tasks/async/check_photo_liveness/face"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "user-authentication3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Name compare(sync)
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to compare two names. It consumes two strings in the request body and returns a match score on a scale of 1 to 5.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://user-authentication3.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/compare/ind_names"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "user-authentication3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
